frontMatter.title: O Canada
frontMatter.summary: The scenic lands of Canada featuring maple leaves, snow-capped mountains, turquoise lakes and Toronto. Take in the sights in this photo gallery exhibition and see how easy it is to replicate with some MDX magic and tailwind classes.

prev.title: Sample .md file
prev.summary: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting

next.title: The Time Machine
next.summary: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...
